name: player_salaries with where
description: Test case for player_salaries with where
expected_query: with "t6558bff27f5619303d370c6360ae0c26" as (select "player_salaries"."pid", "player_salaries"."salary", "nfl_games"."year", "nfl_games"."week" from "player_salaries" inner join "nfl_games" on "player_salaries"."esbid" = "nfl_games"."esbid" where "player_salaries"."source_id" in ('DRAFTKINGS') and "nfl_games"."year" in (${constants.current_season.year}) and "nfl_games"."week" in (${constants.current_season.week}) and player_salaries.salary >= '5000') select "player"."pid", "t6558bff27f5619303d370c6360ae0c26"."salary" AS "dfs_salary_0", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "t6558bff27f5619303d370c6360ae0c26" on "t6558bff27f5619303d370c6360ae0c26"."pid" = "player"."pid" group by "t6558bff27f5619303d370c6360ae0c26"."salary", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
